title: Can you help me solve this statistics problem? It asks me to find the 5 number summary based on the box plot. - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer is pretty much done for you in the diagram. It’s just a matter of understanding what’s in front of you. Minimum = 10 Lower Quartile or Q1 =14 Median or Q2 =15 Upper Quartile or Q3 = 17 Maximum = 20 You’ll notice the above answers are located at each end of the whiskers (for max and min) and Q1, Q2 and Q3 are at the ends of each of the 2 boxes. So your answer would be set out as: 10, 14, 15, 17, 20 I hope that will help you.
